website_summaries.verdict: A cozy and comfortable balaclava that still does a great job protecting skiers from the elements.
pros: Comfortable fleece makes this balaclava both cozy and warm
Mesh fabric over the mouth allows wearers to be heard clearly when they speak
Cap portion fits snugly and doesn’t slide around under a ski helmet, plus it’s removable if it gets too warm
cons: Some find the chin and mouth section of the mask to be too loose

customer_reviews.title: Kept me nice and warm!
customer_reviews.text: This baby kept me warm. I originally was wearing a beanie with it, and ended taking it off and keeping only the ski mask on. I was in 10 degree weather and the wind was blowing but my face was well protected.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: The mask is extremely soft and very warm.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first mask of this type I have ever bought. I am not disappointed in it. The ski mask fits really well, is very warm and I love the mesh over the mouth so I could talk to others. I am absolutely thrilled with this mask. I highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Great Lakes region and bicycle year round. The balaclava keeps my head warm. I am riding today and it is 30F. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Jim Groble

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and fits pretty well, and it looks just like the picture. No funny smell, nothing like that. It was cheap and I'll put it with my gloves in my heavy coat and it will work fine for those freezing days. 4 stars because the nose section could be fashioned better, after taking it off the tip of my nose can be a little sore.
customer_reviews.author: F. Cera

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what it claims to be. This is a great quality product that I will be able to use for a while. It keeps your face warm and doesn't restrict breathing like some others. It is made of good materials and seems like it will last. I could not be more happiner with my purchase. It has exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mitchem

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son for Christmas, he works outside and I think this is going to make him feel a little bit warmer, well made and light weight but his face will be well covered, thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and keeps you warm. Can be used without the head portion if you don't want to be too hot. Planning on using this on a future trip to Antarctica.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing needs to be updated.
customer_reviews.text: Product indicates will fit up to 25.5" head but at even 24" it is very unconfortable to put on and does not cover my head.
customer_reviews.author: nabqjohn

customer_reviews.title: The mouth mesh  is too wide to keep out or in any cough, sneeze or virus.
customer_reviews.text: The mouth mesh is too wide to be very effective for use as a virus mask, I guess one could sew some cloth or a handkerchief inside over the mesh to make something more effective. It does fit reasonably well and would work as a ski mask, but probably dust could go through the mesh so I doubt the dust mask part, or its use for allergies or pollen.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Jerian

customer_reviews.title: Well! Couldn't decide WHICH color I liked best; I bought BOTH!
customer_reviews.text: I suppose that these are designed to, comfortably, snow-ski, or work--- outside --- in cold weather. In the, current Corona-virus atmosphere, it's a breathable alternative to a face-hugger-mask strangling THIS seventy+year-old shopper navigating shopping carts inside a store with my--- previously ---fogging eyeglasses. There WERE days when wearing such a thing on my head would garner strange-looks, or, possibly arrest in a bank! Highly recommended for shopping . . . till otherwise, prohibited! Makes shopping fun . . . and the store's air-conditioners are always excessive for we old- folk!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grösch-McCluskey

customer_reviews.title: Very, very small
customer_reviews.text: There is no size selection. I presumed it would fit a average adult but it does not. This mask was so tight on my face I could barely get it on. I ended up giving it to my 14 year old daughter who weighs 100lb and it fits her well. I think you should be aware of this and the manufacturer should definitely give us a size selector or tell us just how small this mask is.
customer_reviews.author: Jraptor

customer_reviews.title: If you wear glasses, dont bother
customer_reviews.text: This does what you would expect it to, except that if you wear glasses, expect fog. The air from your exhale is directed straight up (the mouth vents are not enough) so the moisture condenses on your lenses. The only way I was able to stop this from happening was to pull the nose piece so far up that my glasses sat on top of it. This then led to the mask limited vision and hitting my eyes. I tested both indoors and out and the same results. It was a steal of a deal at $8 when I bought but ultimately ineffective and couter-productive so back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good... but not great
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this product is the lack of flexibility/stretchiness of the materials when putting on/taking off. The problem is the neck area is very tight and it is a bit rough. The only other issue I ran into was the mask part tends to vent breath upwards and steams up my glasses.... so I generally just leave the mouth part down. However airflow thru the mesh mouth piece is pretty good ... so no issues there. All in all, I do like this product and I hope they come up with a solution to make the neck part a bit more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Wray

customer_reviews.title: The mask portion is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I expected to be able to breathe, but the mask portion has no form, unlike a surgical face mask. It collapses against my mouth and nose, and it is very hard to breathe. It does a adequate job of covering head and ears and neck. Just be prepared to pull the mask below your nose in order to breathe, especially while doing a thing strenuous.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Logan

customer_reviews.title: Best for Covid -19 protection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this beginning of the Pandemic. Although it is a ski mask and I have used it for that . I personally love using it for Covid mask since it protects completely and I feel very safe in it. Perfect for anyone who loves wearing a full face covering and in very condensed places it is a perfect mask. USES: - ski mask very safe -Covid - 19 protection - Good for cold cold weathers -Full covering and net to see through the net.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: If your head is as big as a watermelon this is the right hood for you
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in a hurry before my ski trip to lake Tahoe. Once I opened the package a day before my trip I realized this thing was designed for a head as big as a watermelon. I thought I had ordered the wrong size but No it was a single size fits all. Im 5'7 and 140 lbs and my head is about average. Hope this helps with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, Great Job on the design!
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved the Ski Mask. It came in a proprietary ziplock type pouch for storage which I thought was a nice touch. After beginning to try it on I initially thought it might be a little too small going over my head but once over and pulled down to my neck it is a perfect fit to to bottom. The quality is better than expected and has a mesh type section for easy breathing over the mouth. The mask works great in every configuration and I might consider buying a couple more to keep in various vehicles or fo bags. 2 Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Showtime7400

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I live on the shores of Lake Superior and we have days that are often very cold in the Winter. I got this for myself, to keep my face warm when I have to shovel snow when it is under 20 degrees. It is great! I have a 23 inch head, about 1 inch bigger than average and this fits good. I like that it can be worn as a hood, or a full face mask, or partial face mask. My dog goes nuts when I put it on though and tries to pull it off! SO I don't put it on my face until I get outside! LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari H.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Is comfortable as trying on. We have not tested it out in the cold yet. We are not skiers but my husband is a mechanic and works in the cold. Figured it would be nice to help him out on them really cold days... he does have dreads and it did not make it uncomfortable for him or to snug. It is fleece material.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Walker

customer_reviews.title: Still fogs with glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am looking for a facemask that doesn't fog my eye glasses. I tried this out, and it fogged my eye glasses immediately. I recommend something else if you are looking for something that wont fog eye glasses.
customer_reviews.author: TJBHunter

customer_reviews.title: Need warmth for a Long Motorcycle Ride during winter the months then this is a great addition
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and after examination this looks to be the best quality Balaclava I purchased to date. I have quite a few and while none were failures there always another level of quality out there. I believe this is it. I will follow up later with my next review after my thousand mile destination ride to Florida from Maryland. For now fit and quality of construction as well as great price is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: DeLoran B. Lyles

customer_reviews.title: I bought them when the face masks were out of stock
customer_reviews.text: I bought them when the face masks were out of stock as a substitute for face mask. The main drawback is the nose zone in the mask, it is too thin and I'm sure it wont filter particles or droplets, so I added an additional cloth piece to increase security. Also with summer they are a little uncomfortable. I won't reduce more than one star because to be fair they are not face masks to protect from droplets, they are ski masks. Maybe during winter they will be useful because of the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Cui Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I just received this fleece head gear after ordering last night. I'm giving a generic 3 stars only because I'm sitting in my living room yet couldn't keep it on longer than a few minutes. I'm used to the snuggie soft warmth of fleece. This has it yet not tested @ 8k during winter either. I wouldn't say it has any wind stop R factor yet it doesn't claim to have any. It's China made and reading instructions are comical as always. If you were glasses adjusting for fogging is probably a no brainer. Definitely worth the fair price. I suggest warm water wash and a Nikwax treatment. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: love this hat-combo. I've only had it a short time but I'm already thinking of getting a second one in another color. It is very soft material and the variety of configurations is perfect for me. I do a lot of hiking in all weather conditions. I love that I can wear it as a mask in extreme conditions or wear it Pirate style when I just need my bald head covered. I can also wear it around my neck when mountain biking if I have a helmet on or pull it up over my mouth and nose on a ride up the ski lift. This will be my 'go-to' head covering from now on. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Face fitment may not be good.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fit around the mouth all that well and fogs up my sunglasses. Its a good quality piece though. Seems like too much material in length for the neck area but it doesnt bother me. Its just sort of bunched up. Its nice and warm on the ears for cycling in 36 deg weather. The mesh at the front is kind of a win-lose. Its not as soft and is essentially vented. Problem is it gets really wet from breathing and its not stiff enough in wind to keep off your face so it gets cold. Its cheap enough so I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Magneato

customer_reviews.title: Warm! Versatile! And a little too "tickly" for my neck--but I manage.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I got this--it's a great value. The packaging makes it seem like i could use it for about a dozen different things, but really, I will either go full balaclava with this or not really wear it at all. That being said, if you have an aversion to turtlenecks and other things that constantly tickle your neck--there is no relief with this face mask. I do have a fairly large neck and large face--so your mileage will vary. If this mask were only about two inches wider at the neck--I'd be happier.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Good product but started to tear apart after 6 month... Seller sent replacement very fast
customer_reviews.text: Good protection from cold in the winter and reasonable price but stitching started to fall apart from 1 side, I suspect it will continue deteriorate. Update: After contacting the seller who apologized for the issue and arranged to send replacement mask. I received it very fast from Amazon. I am happy to have this nice protection mask. Product is quite universal and served me very well on biking under helmet in colder winter weather day or just for walking as more stable and efficient way to keep my neck warm protected from cold winds that traditional scarf.
customer_reviews.author: andre

customer_reviews.title: It is warm and has good protection
customer_reviews.text: I like this product with few flaws and hence not one less star. Pros: What I love is that it's pretty warm. and the different material around your nose and mouth helped with breathing. Cons It's a bit loose on my head so if I'm not wearing it with Helmet keeping it in place, it'll be very uncomfortable. It says different ways to wear it. but I dont' see it wearing it any other way Did I say it's warm... its super warm so it'll make you uncomfortable when weather is "nicer"
customer_reviews.author: goldy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my father who has COPD and breathing issues and needs to cover his nose and mouth while in the cold. He loves it! The fit is perfect and covers well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly & Eric Blake

customer_reviews.title: Warm but tight over the nose
customer_reviews.text: Fit seemed ok and would have been perfect for skiing but the nose and mouth area didn't seem to line up right. There is a mesh area assuming for you to breath more easily through but in order to get it to line up you have to pull the edge of the mask literally up to your eye balls. Then the non mesh part was still covering your nose making it hard to breath and putting pressure across the bridge of your nose. Just didn't seem comfortable and would not have worked with ski goggles on as well so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: krash023

customer_reviews.title: Nice ski masks and Alternative for mouth cover
customer_reviews.text: These ski masks light weights and really proof You may use them to cover head around neck and mouth It is alternative as mouth covering As it is nice and keep warm for ski, it may feel great in cool weather but not when weather is warmer than 80 above
customer_reviews.author: CIIFEGHQR

customer_reviews.title: Not warm at all.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is not warm at all. I bought it to wear while plowing snow on my 4 wheeler, and the wind cuts right throgh it. Also the vent that you breath through alows wind to blow back trough so its like not even wearing a mask, plus my breath is directed upword thus fogging my glasses do I couldn't see.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Pleased my particular hubby.
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is very particular. I got this for him to use while hunting. He loves it. He made a point to tell me how much he loves it at least 10 times. Keeps his face warm without moisture building up around d his mouth and nose. Neck stays toasty warm. Isn't restrictive.
customer_reviews.author: cmhincomo

customer_reviews.title: Semi-Breathable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but my goggles fog up if I use the full facemask. It is semi breathable material around the nose and mouth, but it still traps moisture inside from my breath, and allows cold outside air in and around my face. The cold draft around my face is kind of annoying, considering that is the main purpose for which I bought it. I think small slits where the nostrils and mouth are located would work better when using goggles, but everyone's face is different so that probably wouldn't work either. I am going to keep this one, but I am searching for another one that works better with goggles and has a thinner yet warmer material.
customer_reviews.author: agentJBM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but...
customer_reviews.text: I use this when riding my motorcycle in cold weather. I like that the top can be easily pulled from top of head. However, there are a couple of faults for my use. The face piece is a little loose. Regardless of usage, it should fit more closely to the face to help with insulation. Also, the neck piece needs to be a little larger. The way it is designed it bunches up around the neck. It's tool long for its circumference.
customer_reviews.author: Soonerpepa

customer_reviews.title: Very comforable, a little loose
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a long face mask for the cold weather because I deliver mail and my cheeks are easily affected by the cold I found this one and it was exactly what I was looking for in terms of nearly full face coverage I tried it on immediately and found it to be quite comfortable albeit very loose around the face area leaving room to move from side to side occasionally. The mesh around the mouth is definitely a plus so you’re not getting the whole mask moist. I do love this product but might love it more if it was a bit tighter on the face. Maybe after I wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Smcmahonx

customer_reviews.title: Great mask! Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy I found this mask. It has made my first few days of braving an early Chicago winter that much easier. It keeps my face warm without causing my nose to run and the hood is easy to pull up and down, as needed, so if the temperature warms up a bit, you can just use it as a neck warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your face warm in -20 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who works In a freezer warehouse and he says it’s a life saver. Was afraid it might not fit because his head a little bigger but it fits fine. Wish there was a small button or something he could tie his mask to it but seeing that it is not meant for work but to ski then it makes sense it doesn’t. Now everyone in his job has asked where he got his mask from and we always send them here. Cap has to be put on first then the face mask if you have hair and don’t want it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Not a good fit, does not stay in place, not sized for everyone, people with larger heads should be Ok
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: If you have a medium/large head do not get this!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 7 1/2 fitted hat and I have no hair and this was extremely tight on the top of my head. I dont imagine this will work with people with larger heads or a bunch of hair. had to return, it looked ridiculous on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile balaclava that is almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this balaclava, but it's not perfect. The part that goes on top of my head feels a bit small while the rest of the balaclava fits just fine if not slightly over sized. I'm a bit disappointed that I can't where top part on my head while wearing my ski helmet. If I need that extra layer of warmth, I would probably need to use a different balaclava with a much thinner top. Other than that, it does just about everything it says it can do, and is nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Okay for weather protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for running when it was a little colder out. The face mask is very thin and breathable which is nice, but I'm not sure the material is solid enough to help protect against spread of coronavirus. If that's what you want, is recommend looking elsewhere. If you just want a ski mask for wind protection, this is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing the ski mask gave me no options of what size nor was I informed of what size they would be sending me. I could only guess it was a one size fits all. I recieved a medium which seems to be OK except for the part that covers your head. It's much too small and rides back off your head unless you have another hat or knitted cap to go over it. Neck and face part are fine.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Versatile Product
customer_reviews.text: I just got the product. It seems well made. It is very comfortable and easy to adjust. There are multiple ways to wear the product which adds to its versatility. I will be replacing a balaclava with it to wear under my snowboarding helmet. Update: I wore it while out for a walk in 30mph winds, wind chill below zero. It was comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: KenW

customer_reviews.title: Covers the head well
customer_reviews.text: This mask does it all! Really covers the face and head. It fits snug so you can add a hat over it for more warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Ceeme

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfort
customer_reviews.text: The material is well made and can keep you warm. I wear glasses and it can fog them up but slightly though. In order to fix it you just have to find a perfect way setting the mask on your face to not have that happen or also you can just breathe out your mouth that reduces it completely. The mesh part for the nose and mouth does remove the cold fresh area from that part. Also its easy to breath and speak out of. I love the part how you can also have it as a hoodie
customer_reviews.author: Richard Avila

customer_reviews.title: No size choice.  Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Too big for me. There needs to be a size choice. The breathing mesh fabric seems like it would rip easily but only time will tell. Gave three because no size choice, but still it fit good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fine, if you don't wear glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a freezer and bought this product to help keep my face warm since I don't like the products the company provides. I was specifically looking for something that would cover my mouth and nose yet allow me to breathe without fogging up my glasses. This product isn't it. Yes, it is comfortable, lightweight and helps keep my face warm, but still lets my breath escape through the top of the face mask so my glasses fog up, then the fog freezes on my glasses and I'm effectively blinded. Great product for anyone who doesn't wear glasses, but basically useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Review: 2 Pack Motorcycle Mask
customer_reviews.text: I use the ski mask to cover my surgical mask so that they have an extra layer. It also let's me look like I'm going skiing and not protecting my health. I got the 2pack black and one is slightly bigger so that one does not fit as well as the smaller. Customer Service is helping me to find a solution so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Demanded 100%
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect I love it because my dad works in the sun all the time and he likes to cover his whole face due to he gets a lot of skin issues you know if it’s hot he needs to wear it but I love the quality because it’s not too hot for him and he’s able to get a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate as a COVID mask
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't wait until winter to slide into this thing because it just feels so wonderful. However, the portion of the mask that goes over your mouth has some largish holes in it, presumably to make it easy to breathe. It won't be blocking any of your aerosols coming out of your mouth tho, so if you want it for that you will need to wear an additional mask underneath it. No other complaints other than that!
customer_reviews.author: Tobin Houser

customer_reviews.title: Warm, too much for COVID
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mask as it was one of the few available when COVID 19 was taking off. However, it is much too warm to wear in the hot south just to protect against airborne transmission. This would be great to wear if we were going somewhere cold and wanted to keep our face warm.
customer_reviews.author: NatPatBen

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, warm, a little big for women, and DOES fog up sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and warm and comfortable but I bought for the face and nose protection and I can only use that feature if I have the skull cap portion on too otherwise it just falls down. Probably would work better on someone larger but as an average size woman, it is a bit too big. And while better than just using a scarf, it does still easily and quickly fog up my sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Warm, lightweight, and really cheap to buy in the summer
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyyy better than Salvador Dali masks for your next Money Heist. Seriously, in the wrong context, this will make you look like a bank robber. But if you go this route, I recommend to only rob banks in winter. If you used this in July you might die from heat stroke long before the police arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose as of recent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these masks for the trip that my family and I were planning. Due to the recent virus outbreak and the mask shortage issues, these masks has been my go to. Although I feel crazy wearing it, I don't have any other mask to wear and am wearing these for now. I will update my review once we are able to hit the ski slopes, hopefully later this year!
customer_reviews.author: sham129

customer_reviews.title: This will not work for sub temperatures with windchill
customer_reviews.text: I wanted those to work very badly they look nice , but they will not work if you try to to walk in sub temperatures with - windchill it will burn your Mouth . The mouth area is way to big and let’s wind go right through it . I wish I could return but after wearing it i know you probably can’t return it. I’m disappointed about those Masks
customer_reviews.author: victoria s.yunker

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I like the fit and it is wind proof. I went for a bike ride tonight wearing it and it was fantastic, the temps were only in the 30's so not that cold but still fit very well and kept my neck and ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and is very soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: The balaclava fits well. It is very soft and warm. I tried it out last week when it was ten degrees and with a windchill factor below zero. This kept me extremely warm. I like how it goes down to the neck as that blocks the wind from getting trapped in my shirt. So it kept me warm and did what it was intended to do and more.
customer_reviews.author: RazE

customer_reviews.title: Glasses fog up quickly
customer_reviews.text: The mask fits well and is somewhat warmer than my thinner balaclava, but my glasses fog up quickly, regardless of how far up I wear the portion that’s worn under the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ettwein

customer_reviews.title: small head? then you might like this
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I bought this. too small and too thin. I do not recommend it. Wind proof NO NO NO. Only good thing I can say is - its better then nothing. I recommend getting a much better hat and then also a gator. I am just using this for going on walks with my dog. Tossed it. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Kept head and face warm. Did have some moisture issues by vent area. Had some fogging up of sunglasses worn with mask. A bit tight on neck as most Chinese merchandise made for smaller people.
customer_reviews.author: Indiandaeng

customer_reviews.title: Late but love the mask.
customer_reviews.text: I think this Baklava looks like a Premium mask, I love the style. It's not one like the under armor one that's fitted, but I think this one will keep u very warm. The only negative I have on this is that an amazon driver forgot my package on his/her route so I got my package late. Was just happy to finally get it.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Cragan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, fleecy baclava at a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits perfectly—I have a smallish head and it has some stretch. I also wanted something that wasn’t spandex or neoprene. The “hood” part folds down if I don’t want to use that. I got it mainly because I get exercise-induced asthma in the winter from breathing in the cold air. I don’t need my inhaler every time I go outside. #winning
customer_reviews.author: Amzncustmr

customer_reviews.title: Wisconsin winters
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this, but it was too big for me. It does a great job keeping wind out but you can still breathe without it getting full of condensation in the mask. We use ours for blowing snow mostly. When it's below zero with winds blowing strong, this is nice to have. Just wish it fit women better.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my husband and he is wearing it everyday because he works at store and it is cold inside and i hope it helps to protect from any germs and all that kind of stuff. And it is very comfortable and easy to wear, iam glad i bought it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Khongorzul Badrakh

customer_reviews.title: To cold protection at all around mouth. Head too small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these ski masks for a recent ski trip with my 21 year old daughter and 13 year old son. I am an adult man with a small head and the head part of the mask was too small in me and my daughter. It is also a little too thick for the ski helmet to fit comfortably. The material over the mouth was like a window screen. It is so thin that all the cold air hits your mouth and face like there is nothing there at all. We had high hopes but we’re very disappointed. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: Thicker fleece for more extreme weather
customer_reviews.text: I got a black and a gray one. Both were well made. It kept us warm on the ski slops and blocked the wind. It also fits both my daughter and son who are 4 and 7. The kids never complain about being cold. It's a bit ticker than most balaclava so just account for that if you are using a helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Lianger

customer_reviews.title: One size doesn’t fit all
customer_reviews.text: It was great for keeping you warm but I didn’t like that it’s one size fits all. It was too big on my face as a girl, but fit my boyfriends face great. Something to consider. The front material kept a good job of keeping snow out, but I still found my face was wind burned after a day of heavy skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wright

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mask don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible mask. Totally not designed for a human head/face. Bought this for upcoming Covid snowboard season thinking it would have a better fit than my regular ski mask I’ve been using for years and I am very disappointed in the fit it’s so baggy. And it has big holes mesh for nose/mouth area so definitely doesn’t protect from Covid. Don’t understand how this has so many stars on reviews. I very rarely give a review and I had to on this one. Save you money and time get a regular turtle fur face ski mask or any other brand you’ve used before and are happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Luke C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit large face/head
customer_reviews.text: The product its self is fine, felt nice and seemed well made. However it was too small - if i opened my mouth the mesh would just go right in side, the face mask was way to small. I sterilized it with heat and chemicals and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: hans peter jensen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I went skiing for the first time, and was afraid I was going to be too cold on the mountain. This kept my head and neck very warm! I used it for full cover over my neck, mouth, nose, and head. With my helmet and goggles, my whole face was covered. I plan on buying a second one, so I have one to use while the other is in the wash. I was very happy with my purchase and highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It's too tight... if this is a large, then I would need extra large...
customer_reviews.text: Neck piece is not as lose as one might like... it should fit without bunching up in my opinion. It may strech out after a while... I will review further after I have worn it enough to feel different than I do now. I have a 7 1/2 hat size and this has to strech quite a bit more for my comfort...
customer_reviews.author: gary clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Nice ski mask
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with how comfortable the ski mask was out easy it was to breathe through yet how well it stood up to cold and wind very high quality for a very good price I would definitely buy again I did not receive any money or free products for this review
customer_reviews.author: JDP55

customer_reviews.title: I have a XXL head...
customer_reviews.text: This product if you have a large head like me is not one size fits all. I was also hoping it would breathe better than my ski mask like head wear but doesnt really. All of that said its a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: These are much more expensive at the local retail stores. I used this in Cleveland during a snow storm amd worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Jonny B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and it's soft. We have tiny head size but it is still a good fit because with the little extra room a hat could be wornto fill the space. It seems to be made with quality from looking at it and trying it on but it haven't been cold enough to wear it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Keeps his face warm from the freezing cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my boyfriend who is a FedEx delivery man. We live in Chicago and these are definitely needed for those winter days! He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Donia

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm mask with many ways to wear
customer_reviews.text: Great for cold weather and still being able to wear a covid mask. It’s very warm and like a portable hood. It does scare some people though. So keep in mind who you walk in front on wearing it or you might get poped.
customer_reviews.author: Crypto

customer_reviews.title: Great Balaclava
customer_reviews.text: This is a great winter outdoor balaclava, light , warm and versital. Love being able to pull it down and use it as a scarf, lower face cover is surprisingly comfortable and very warm. I used this on a two day winter backpack trip with great results.
customer_reviews.author: thomas a miller

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for this type of product.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason this didn't get 5 stars was the area around the mouth isnt actually wind proof due to letting you breathe more freely. Its a trade off you would have to consider but overall amazing product everything else stayed nice and toasty except my cheeks at times.
customer_reviews.author: Keoni Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you can breath AND keep your face warm
customer_reviews.text: I wear glasses, and normally when I wear balaclavas, my breath gets pushed up in a away that fogs up my glasses--not a fun (or entirely safe) commute! Not with this! I personally am not a fan that it's all one piece, and If you have an abnormally large cranium (like myself) then it's a lil tight...but the product itself is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Okay, has its problems
customer_reviews.text: Great for cold temps. My problem with it is the holes in the mouth area. This let's cold wind in too much and ruins the effectiveness of the mask. Not very nice having cold wind on your face. I have to pair it with a scarf or another lightweight ski mask.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Works great in a freezer
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use at work, where I'm in temps of -5 to -10 all day driving equipment. All in all, it works great for its price, helps keep the wind off my face, extremely easy to breath with, the only issue I had was it's a little loose around the face on the bottom, would be great if it had something like a cinch or velcro on the back to adjust tightness and hold it around your nose without moving.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyoh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice snug fit, doesn't feel too loose. Fleece in all the right areas. Minor concern is the mouth window because its covered with a thin mesh. It'll make it easy to breathe but I'm afraid it might let too much cold air in. Its also a tad bit longer than expected. Will have to test more thoroughly when it gets cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and not too short like Others :-)
customer_reviews.text: This really keeps you warm and blocks most of the wind. It’s long enough to tuck down either around or into your shirt. Not too short like many Others I’ve tried or bought. Comfortable and worth the cost. I Highly recommend it. Nice. Just ... Nice!
customer_reviews.author: James Rush

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: At 45 mph into the cold wind, after getting drenched by a huge wave over my T-top, this ski mask kept my face and bald head warm and had actually dried before I realized it. It has ensured its place on my boat every time I take her out!
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: On those over night shifts this really make a difference. It really keeps the chill off the head. And it is versital because you can wear it covering the whole head or with it just covering the face. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Warning Fit not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The cap is to small for a medium head and won't pull down over the ears. Nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Larry F. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the thickness. It does keep my face warm and protected from the elements. However it doesn't fit my face well, it's hard for me to breathe with it on and I can't see what's below me.
customer_reviews.author: SincereGiggles

customer_reviews.title: Nice cold weather wind blocker
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for hunting. Used in 20-30 degree weather with 10-15 mph. This was comfortable and kept me warm. With a little adjusting I was able to avoid fogging. Little tight around the nose but it also wouldn’t work as well if it wasn’t a little tight. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rydlund

customer_reviews.title: It works just like it is supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: It fits it’s quite comfortable and in cold weather it would definitely add a layer of warmth. It’s also nice that it has been manufactured in a way that you could use it with or without covering the top of your head.
customer_reviews.author: JACK

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my motorcycle, biggest test will be tonight, low of 55 degrees! Love the multipurpose from cap to full face!
customer_reviews.author: James Costello

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This came within like a day of purchasing. Bought this for my husband. He works at a warehouse at extremely cold temps all day. This helped keep him warmer and also helps as a protective mask for him. I love it..
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for windy city chicago..
customer_reviews.text: So worth the head gear always a fan of these products esp when its windy always good to have on, no hat needed with this covers face very well, bought medium if you like tight go a size down if a biker but walking dogs medium is normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Bode 1

customer_reviews.title: It's warm but putting it on sucks`
customer_reviews.text: Hurt my face no matter what after a small amount of time, but it is super warm!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy G

customer_reviews.title: Size only Medium.
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate this its a Medium size. (I ordered the navy blue one). No where in ordering or desription does it say its a medium or allows u to select a size. Im a smaller person and this doesnt fit me as i would need a small.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great balaclava. Very soft and hasn’t irritated my face or neck area yet. It blocks the wind out well and keeps your face warm. I’ve worn this in -15°f when windy and it worked out well. I would recommend this if you’re on a budget or even if your not it’s a quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Filt well and works as intended
customer_reviews.text: This provides full coverage when skiing and hiking in the cool. Good quality not Chinese “crap” Alao works good as a full face masks if you add a filter to the mouth piece
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Button's don't stay
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it. The buttons don't stick on. Since it comes rolled up. It won't stay on your face without touching it and rolling under your chin. When u lift shield buttons unsnap.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Davis

customer_reviews.title: All Around Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME MASK. These Mask are Well Made. Priced Fairly. HOWEVER, MOST OF ALL THEY ARE WARM, AND I CAN BREATHE THROUGH THEM. I really wish this company made COVID19 masks as well. Highly Recommend. If there were 10 Stars, they would get them all.
customer_reviews.author: ALR
